name: ESRI Arc Geodatabase
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension"></field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: ESRI Arc Geodatabase is the common data storage and management framework for ArcGIS v 8.x onwards.  This data model is expressed in file geodatabases and personal geodatabases for single users, and spatial database engine geodatabases for multi-use and/or enterprise geodatabases.
